item.description:
Herb is throwing a unique vegetarian holiday party with a theme of ways to enjoy the winter! This will be a great alternative to the crowded and loud bar scene. Herbâ€™s party will be fun, with a quiet and intimate setting where you have a chance to have a conversation with the people around you. For the first two hours we will enjoy hanging out and eating. At 9:00 Herb will lead an informal, fun and meaningful discussion about how we can make the best of the cold weather, winter activities to do and how to enjoy the winter. Afterwards we might resume hanging out or tell stories.

The party is also a potluck so if you can please bring a vegetarian dish/snack or dessert or candy! This being The Unique Journey, feel free to wear a winter theme holiday costume! Costumes and potluck items are optional, but there is a $10.00 cover charge (which is much less than what other events are charging). The party goes from 7:00 - 11:00 so feel free to come and go whenever you want.
item.name: Unique Holiday Party
